oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Asymptotic analysis of piezoelectric shells with variable thickness
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SABU, N
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: 2-dimensional approximation
eigenvalue problems
shallow shells
justification
equations
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper, we consider the boundary value problem for thin piezoelectric shells with variable thickness subjected only to mechanical body force and we show that, as the thickness of the shell goes to zero, the solution of the three-dimensional equations converge to the solution of two-dimensional problem.
